current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to provide
		  for the eligibility of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region for
		  designation for participation in the visa waiver program for certain visitors
		  to the United States.

cosponsor.#tail:
) introduced the following
			 bill; which was read twice and referred to the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
is amended by adding at the end the
			 following new paragraph:

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Section 217(c) of the Immigration and
			 Nationality Act

header.#text:
Eligibility of Hong Kong
			 Special Administrative Region for designation for participation in visa waiver
			 program for certain visitors to the United States

Eligibility of
				certain region for designation as program country

text.#text:
The Hong Kong
				Special Administrative Region of the People's Republic of China—

may be designated
				as a program country for purposes of this subsection if such region meets
				requirements applicable for such designation in this
				subsection.

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 S703 IS: To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to provide for the eligibility of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region for designation for participation in the visa waiver program for certain visitors to the United States.
